member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.FileController.GetFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns specific file created by Authorized user

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.FileController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all of the file that belongs to given project created by Authorized user

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.FileController.Post(Core.Features.Files.Commands.CreateFileCommand)
member.summary: Creates file with file path and content for Authorized user

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.FileController.UpdateFileContent(Core.Features.Files.Commands.UpdateFileCommand)
member.summary: Updates file path and content for Authorized user
member.remarks: To update file path, pass existing content and change new path: PUT api/file/foo/bar.py { "projectName": "webitor", "path": "README.md", "content": "### Webitor 2.0" }

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.FileController.RenameFile(Core.Features.Files.Commands.RenameFileCommand)
member.summary: Rename file path and content for Authorized user
member.remarks: To update file path, pass existing content and change new path: PUT api/file/foo/bar.py { "projectName": "webitor", "oldPath": "README.md", "newPath": "### Webitor 2.0" }

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.FileController.MoveAll(Core.Features.Files.Commands.MoveFilesCommand)
member.summary: Moves all of the files in the given path into the new path for Authorized user like linux command mv: $ mv /foo/bar/* /baz/bar/
member.remarks: To update file path, pass existing content and change new path: PUT api/file/foo/bar.py { "projectName": "webitor", "oldPath": "/foo/bar", "newPath": "/baz/bar" }

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.FileController.Delete(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes file that has given path for Authorized user

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.ProjectController.DownloadProject(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads whole repository as a zip file for authenticated user

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.ProjectController.Get
member.summary: Returns all projects created by Authorized user

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.ProjectController.DeleteProject(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes project created by Authorized user

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.ProjectController.UpdateProject(Core.Features.Projects.Commands.UpdateProjectCommand)
member.summary: Updates project created by Authorized user
